Such a cute place to come for drinks and light lunch or picky foods.  Decor is so nice inside and lots of sitting options inside or outside.  Outside there are tables that are covered in case of inclement weather as well as really cool rooftop all overlooking Hudson River.  We sat at the bar.  I tried a macha mule which was a very unique spin on the moscow mule.  The color was a little funky looking, but it was pretty tasty!  We shared a flatbread, oysters and a charcuterie plate and all were good and hit the spot for a mid afternoon snack.  Place was hopping on a Saturday at 4:00 pm.  Definitely recommend this place!
Great views, pricey drinks and the food was underwhelming. Not to mention the service was horrendous, the server took forever on the food and drink order and the waters were always empty

love love love City Vineyard! I live close by and they are awesome. Great service. Great drinks. Even took our temperature on the way in so we felt super comfortable at this time. Highly recommended. Lots of space and dog friendly :)))) will be back...probs weekly !!!

Love this place!! Did bottomless with my girls here, the mimosas were made with blood orange juice and it was exponentially better than regular mimosas. Flor was a great waitress and constantly filled up all of our drinks without us needing to ask. Would recommend this spot to anyone looking for a good bottomless brunch deal w/ excellent food!

This is such a chill spot! It was super duper hot and unfortunately we couldn't get a seat inside but regardless the view outside is worth suffering through the summer heat. My friends and I split a bottle of prosecco and also had a shrimp flatbread. I would come back here when it's not so hot for sure!
Lucas is the best!!! Seafood Paella is great and great view. Girlfriends love this place take them here. My girlfriend had a lot of fun. I hope you do too!
Had such a great time at City Vineyard! Shoutout to Flor for being the best waitress!!
No comment
If you're looking for a low key place with outdoor seating, great wine, great food, great service, and great views this is the place to be!!
I love this place. My friends and I have been coming here for years. Very friendly staff and great service... even during quarantine. They aim to please. Highly recommended. Justin is the best.
Really cute place on the Hudson. I came here with my friend to get drinks and appetizers and the staff was very friendly. COVID friendly and all outdoor seating!
Great atmosphere! Fun drinks! A great time on the Hudson (: Also super COVID friendly.
Came here for a friend's birthday brunch....great service. Lucas was the best waiter!

After a 55min wait and a server with no excuses we decided to pay our drink and leave. We ordered one sandwich and one burger and it was impossible for these guys to make it in 55min. The restaurant wasn't full and the attitude wasn't their best feature.  It's amazing how this kind of place doesn't care about this type of things. There were 2 additional tables who were also waiting someone to take their order.
ASK FOR FLOR!!! We had a large group and she was so accommodating - never an empty glass! Highly recommend. Good food an added plus!

Our service has been outstanding, he's a great people person, and I recommend this place to anyone who's would like an intimate dinner, or catching up with a couple of friends. Andy who was our server was spectacular I would recommend this place to everyone. Thank you for the appreciation.

Outstanding experience from beginning to end. Fast and efficient COVID screening upon entry. Diverse menu with no bad options -- all perfect for a warm summer day. Delightful view of the Hudson. Matt P. provided consummate service -- timely and courteous with spot-on suggestions.
No comment

This place wins with the views of the Hudson River. They also have live shows in the main room. It's definitely nice in the warmer weather. They have great drinks and apps!! The atmosphere is casual, great for a night out with friends!! Our server was Flor, she was great!!
We had such a fabulous brunch with Stefana.  She not only took care of us, but even better care of our 3 pups! The food is great!

We went to this restaurant because a favorite singer/song writer (Charley Mars) was playing there. Frankly, we were expecting TGIF type of food. Boy were we surprised. The cuisine was inventive, delicious, beautifully prepared and presented. We started with a grape and manchego cheese salad with a balsamic vinaigrette. It was extremely fresh and tasty. We also had a pesto and ricotta cheese flat bread that was the best we've ever had; the cheese had a creamy consistency and the flat bread was the perfect thickness - crispy but not burnt. The fusilli bolognese was one of the best we've ever had - the sauce had the right combination of beef, pork and veal with the proper degree of sweetness and just a hint of lavender. The cocktail and wine offerings were extensive. AND, the views of lower Manhattan and the New Jersey Skyline were awsome. Don't miss trying this restaurant!

Picturesque New York spring day. The sun sparkling off the water, the sailboats in the Hudson... beautiful. The wine list was ideal for unwinding with close friends while we watched the sun set. Our server Bryan took fantastic care of us. With the roof deck open, it was the perfect blend of busy enough to be seen but not too busy to wait for a drink.

Great summer stop! Beautiful view right on the water and the near One World trade. Lots of different wine options and on tap which is so unique. We shared a lot of the small plates with a group. The risotto balls were by far my favorite. The calamari also had a great crispness. Would definitely go back for another visit.
Great views on the hudson! Good drinks, food and good service, especially Flor and Justin!
Fabulous service from Flor. Delicious food fast service, great brunch spot. Got the delicious chicken sandwich. Highly recommend if you're in the neighborhood.
Great food, great vibes, and great views. Flor helped me and my friends have an amazing brunch experience here!
Beautiful views, great service from Lucas and delicious food. What more could you want?

Came here for Brunch over the weekend and had an amazing time, thanks to the great food, atmosphere, and our server Antonio! He was extremely personable and went above and beyond to make sure that we had a great experience. I will definitely be back!
No comment

This is now one of my favorite restaurants in the city!! It's the only one on the water, the staff was so friendly and accommodating. Specifically we had PJ, who was super attentive, kind, and friendly. The food was also delicious, our group had the salmon with cauliflower purée and asparagus, risotto balls and the flatbread. The risotto balls were just eh for me, but everything else was absolutely delish!!

I have been here several times.  It was ok. Today it was horrible.  Eggs benedict served with basically boiled eggs instead of poached.  Salad served with too much dressing.  Pototoes overcooked and not editble. And- servers are clueless.  I will never return.   Great view, but food and service are embarrassing.
Had a fantastic time!!! Brian was amazing! We had the flatbread, charcuterie etc. go here!!!
City Vineyard was amazing, such good vibes and good foods. Loved the service given by Flora and the team. The salmon and sides were amazing!
Good food and service, entertainment is great, new performance every day. Will come again

This place is awesome!! Iram, our server, was the best! Super friendly, an infectious laugh, and had the most amazing recommendations!!! We had a bottle of Curvature 2012 Cabernet and a bottle of City Winery Sauvignon Blanc...both absolutely amazing! The mussels were recommended as a special and they were some of the best mussels I've had! We also ordered the mushroom risotto and it was so good!! Next time my wife and I are in NYC ...we will definitely be coming back!!!

this place has really good atmosphere. servers are really fast, nice and kind. but if you wanna sit outside definitely you should make a reservation. i ve got arugula  salad and salmon. arugula salad was very fresh and tasty. salmon was very tasty but if it has a side dish it would be better :)
Amazing socially distanced outdoor experience! Great views, great drinks and snacks. Felt extremely safe. Server Carlos was incredibly nice and helpful. Can't wait to return!
Brian was the best! So attentive! The mushroom risotto is a must! Best sunset view! Everyone should go!!!
Beautiful place to go too! Great view and amazing service thanks to our server Flor! We will definitely coming back again!

Hidden TriBeCa Gem off the west side highway. Covered outdoor lounge makes you feel like its summer still, even in the winter. Super light and airy, with a really fun vibe. Worth crossing the highway for. Justin and the rest of the staff are fabulous and very welcoming. Wine was delicious! Will definitely be back.

Went during the winter, and the outdoor porch was great. The enclosed porch keeps it warm but you can still enjoy it like you're fully outside. A lot of room for groups, big and small. The wine and food are good too, just an all around solid spot to enjoy the water in NYC. Flor was a great waitress and super attentive.

Great views and great wine. I would 100% reccomend this place for a 5 PM wine session and watch the sunset. Flor was so sweet and made sure we got great service. Cozy environment, definitely give it a try, you won't be disappointed!

My family and I came here for a graduation lunch. The staff is absolutely lovely from check in to cashing out. Our server Antonio was attentive, friendly and provided great recommendations. It was my first time here but it definitely won't be my last. The risotto balls were a hit with everyone! My favorite was the flatbread and shrimp roll. Seat outside if you can, the view is beautiful!
We've been there a couple of times during summer, had some drinks, the seafood is delicious!! we always have a great time!! The view is amazing!
perfect summer ambiance, great drinks, delicious food. the rosé spritz was excellent for brunch!

Arrived at city vineyard and was seated immediately. Had the greatest hostess Ashley who gave us recommendation for the paella that ended up tasting phenomenal. She then gave us recommendations for fun things to do after dinner and drinks to try next time once they open up the rooftop, warmer weather permitting  Wil definitely be back in the future. Love this place.
Beautiful venue with an awesome wine & cocktail menu. Limited in beer, but not lacking in food! We got the paella and it was awesome. Look forward to coming back here soon

Wow. This was a really great meal. Flor was an incredible server! When we had a need, she rushed right to to it. The food was delicious and the atmosphere was amazing. That view? Stunning! Highly recommend for a date, girls night out, or even a family meal.

Love this place! Wine, great food and what a spectacular view. We came out to catch up and have a girls night out and it was perfect. Not too loud so we could catch up but also perfect comfortable environment and not too crowded. Our server Florè was amazing as was Evan the GM. The food came out fast (we did a charcuterie board - fabulous and some rosé). The view is also unbelievable. See my pictures! Highly recommend this place!

My fiancé and I Had brunch here this Saturday and had a lovely time. Great food, great wine, and great view on the water. Would Definitely recommend the risotto balls! Also Lucas took excellent care of us! Will return here soon with my girlfriends :)

We came here on a very nice spring day and enjoyed some cocktails + rose. The food was good (burger, kale salad, and flatbread). The views are spectacular. Our server | Alexandria | was amazing! I think she could read minds because I always ask for people to surprise me and she suggested a surprise cocktail to my delight. Definitely coming back.

Place has a nice view at the rooftop. However they seem to be understaffed. My boyfriend & I sat at a table, it took an eternity for a waitress to come attend us!! & after we ordered our drinks & appetizer it took even longer! Like really?! How long does it take to pour wine in a glass? Their food menu is super expensive for such a small portion. I wouldn't recommend anyone to eat or drink here. I'd only come back for the view.
No comment
Great location but the service and food did not meet our expectations. After seeing my original post, the manager kindly reached out by email to apologize and turn things around. Thank you!!

Lovely area for birthday, celebrations or a drink after work. There is a rooftop patio bar that serves beer, and wine. Inside, there is a combination of indoor, outdoor, and covered patio seating. There is an excellent view of the Hudson river as well as New Jersey across the way. It is outstanding for sunsets. Lucas was our excellent waiter; ask if he is available.

Spectacular view, loved the rosè. This is more of a -stop for a drink and check out the view - kind of place. As for the food, raw bar was fresh (oysters were very good). The salmon was exceptionally bland, the baked clams had too much cheese, my husbands burger was not cooked at the right temperature, and the paella was mediocre. Overall, I would come back for the drinks and to hang out and enjoy the scenery but would not come hungry.
Lucas gave us exceptional service!!! You have to try the wine on tap here it's delicious! Thank you Lucas :)
PJ is best waiter here everyone should sit at his table... only coming back if he is serving us!!!!

Great place, georgios view, amazing food. Our witres Brian was really nice and helpful. It's not my firsts time at this place, always very good experience. Would definitely recommend this place, especially for a dinner on the sunset! Love this place.
Great afternoon at City Vineyard. Brian was very attentive! Good food and great wine!
Great experience, Lucas was an excellent server ! Perfect spot for drinks with a view.

I went there on a warm and sunny February afternoon and it is absolute perfection!  On warm days, sitting outside, overlooking the Hudson River with a glass of wine is just what we need!  It gives you a sense of peace in the bustling city.  The wine selection is great - they even have a selection of wines on tap!  I didn't have any of the cocktails but the menu looked fun and creative - and tasty!  I just had a light snack of the house marinated olives which were absolutely delicious!  I can't recommend this place enough - especially on a nice day!
No comment

This review is primarily for the service! Stefana, our server, was incredibly helpful and accommodating! She acknowledged that our food was taking a bit longer and came by to check up on us. Additionally, she was attentive and gave great suggestions for food alternatives :)! Also the gorgeous view helps set the ambiance on a nice day

For a first time visitor, this place is THE quintessential NYC rooftop bar... unbelievable location.. no cover charge (even on a Friday evening).. great views of the Hudson & JC skyline make it a must visit on a summer evening... excellent non pretentious crowd (not so common in NYC)...
Mushroom risotto and shrimp flatbread were fantastic. Great ambiance. And our server Brian was a pleasure!
Amazing experience!! Food was great. Amazing service from our host LUCAS!!!! I highly recommend the watermelon salad.

Had the loveliest evening watching the sunset over the Hudson River. The food was excellent--we had a large group and split arancini, a charcuterie board, a soppresata flatbread, and fries. Flor was our waitress and she was so kind and helpful. This place can be a bit crowded so be prepared to wait, but know that it's worth it! Recommend arriving early for a prime NYC day drinking and dining experience. Order the rosé magnum. ;)

It's a really nice place to go during summer. They open the front and upstairs patio. It's right by the water so you get the feel of fresh freeze. Also they have good collection of wine, I tried their rose.
Had such a wonderful experience here. Great wine and an even better view. Our server Lucas was exceptional. A must visit.

Finally cool enough to sit outside so went to CV. Got a table right away, decided on a rosé, looked up and there he was. Milos was Johnny on the spot and killed it for the rest of the night. Can't say enough about the service. Oh by the way, great food that came out quickly
No comment
Such a beautiful location and great food! Perfect for a couple drinks and appetizers with friends! Also our server Flor was very attentive!!
City vineyard has great views of the Hudson. We came for brunch on a girls trip. Lucked out and had great weather with even better service. Flor is awesome.
Wonderful experience! The view was beautiful, food was great, and the staff (especially Rodrigo) was very friendly! Highly recommend!!!!

Amazing service by our server Andy. Checking in at just the right times. But a tip to the hostesses, be more accurate with regard to wait times, with less attitude. Had to walk up twice to re-request a table after being told a two hour wait *twice* but really the table was ready in 1 minute (first time) & 15 minutes (second time) .... Either way, worth it once on the patio with Andy. THANKS City Vineyard, great view. Great time
No comment
Flor hooked it up - such a good meal & experience  went with 2 other vegetarians and shared the french omelet, marg pizz, & mushroom pizza (all fab) with the rosé spritz. Recommend all!

City vineyard is an awesome place to come with friends, coworkers, a date. I came with my future sister in law for a girls night out. Appetizers, drinks and the views are outstanding. Ask for Rodrigo and lilly, he was very attentive and answered all my questions. I like to ask a lot of questions.
This place is the best if you love and great view and a great glass of wine. Our server Lucas was amazing - everything he recommended we loved!!! Try the mousse for dessert :)

Our City Vineyard experience was one in a million! Alexandra was our server and she was extremely accommodating, genuine, and friendly. We had just come into City Vineyard after the torrential downpour - we were soaking wet and in need of a drink. We waited no time to be seated and our server was with us shortly after. Food and drinks came out in a timely manner. Would definitely stop here on vacation for amazing views, unbelievable food, and even better service!

It was a beautiful afternoon to spend sitting on the outdoor patio enjoying the warm sun, a soft breeze and the gorgeous view. Tasty chicken salad - perfectly balanced flavors. And the sauce with the Belgian fries was different yet delicious.
City vineyard is a great weekend spot! Our server Lucas always keeps our orange blossom drinks full. The view of the Hudson isn't bad either!
This place is a hidden gem in Manhattan. Great Hudson views and even better cocktails. Our server, Lucas, was great! Definitely visit if you can and try the Orange Blossom cocktail .
Had a great evening at this restaurant. Food was excellent and the waiter Lucas was very polite. Would definitely come back again.

We had Flor as our waitress and we were very impressed but the hospitality and the ambiance of the restaurant. The food was exception and extremely fairly priced for brunch in New York. My girlfriend had mentioned that it was the best French today she's ever had so there's that too. Overall great experience and I'd definitely come back again.

The view is awesome, and the concept is great.  The biggest issue frankly is easy to fix - the music is best characterized  as Jersey Shore bachelorette party.  It was also too loud when we were there.  I'm surprised people don't call 311 - it's noise pollution and a total deterrent to going there.  Thank you for allowing dogs on the roof deck - very cool.  Just please fix the music, anything would be better than Michael Jackson, Usher and the B-52s.  Update: I've since learned the music isn't always "wedding" and that they do sometimes get compliments on the hackneyed classics...I'll give it another shot and hope for improved music.
No comment

City Vineyard is going to be my go to spot for Friday nights. I expected to wait for hours to be seated but we got seated very quickly. In fact the hostesses kept apologizing for the wait. The food was amazing. Our server Sammy was excellent and attentive. We had such a great time.
Great food, glorious wine, great staff, gorgeous view (a little cold in winter perhaps). This place is the best (and my husband and I are utter food and wine snobs).

This beautiful, airy spot is amazing! The stunning view and delectable dishes (try the asparagus, YUM! the juicy vineyard burger with gruyere, and the incredible mushroom flatbread) are worth it on their own, but on top of that we had incredible service by our STAR server Lucas [APPLAUSE!!] , and visits by the lovely floor manger Alexandria and joyous Junior, both checking on our dinner plates. We will be back, and we will bring friends! What an enjoyable evening! Xoxo

The view alone is amazing!! Went on a weekday around 4 pm and was not crowded at all. Of course because location everything is very pricey but its totally worth it! Didn't try food because they were in between lunch/dinner but menu seemed to have alot of options. It is definitely a place to go if you want to catch up with friends over some wine!
Excellent outdoor patio! Beautiful views and great for large groups! The patio itself is very spacious. Highly recommend and will be back a lot this summer!
City Vineyard is great! Flor and Justin were the best! It is amazing and everyone should go.
We love city vineyard and come all the time it's amazing. Highly highly highly recommend. The sFlor and Justin are the BEST!!!

Went here last night after walking the city. Our waiter Pedro was very kind and attentive to our needs! Even recommended some great food and drinks! I had the "Kombrewcha" to drink and it was amazing. We also had the calamari for an appetizer and it was awesome!  Definitely will come back!
Delicious food, great views and friendly service from Iram! A stellar experience. Great for business clients and pleasure alike!
No comment
Love the outdoor space and the prosecco!!!!! Brian was an absolute gentlemen serving the group. Would recommend to anyone.
I love City Vineyard! Brian was the best waiter! I went with my friend on a Friday afternoon, we had wine and appetizers and it was delightful! We will definitely be back!
Lucas was awesome! So sweet and attentive. The food and drinks were delicious. The view was beautiful and the atmosphere was excellent. Can not wait to come back!
Amazing place to go! Everyone was so welcoming and Flor made this experience better than expected! i can't wait to tell all my friends about this place & i'm excited to return :)

Great view, great ambiance, great service. Food was delicious and service was exemplary. But if you're looking for the wow factor, ask for Lucas. All in all a fantastic experience, 10/10 would come again.

Lovely view, great service.. Lucas, our waiter was very helpful with menu suggestions.. and our dog Red loved being welcomed to treats and some water. Very hospitable venue .. give it a try, it won't disappoint! Lunchtime food was delicious.. try the rice balls.. and local wine.. along with salad selection, and of course a delicious burger! .. we cant help the pics of our furry baby.. any restaurant that welcomes dogs  is top choice for us!!
Great location! The wine was fantastic and our server Lucas was very friendly and helpful. Check it out!
Brian was a 10 at service! Very attentive. Quality and consistency was not matched but who cares when you have a server like Brian!
Brian is the best waiter.  Kept our drinks and pizzas coming evening as it got very busy.  He was extremely friendly and accommodating.
Lucas was great! This place is amazing. Great views perfect for rose all day! Honestly you should come here when you get a chance
This is the best place. I always can get a table and the staff is very attentive. Lucas is he BEST. He was kind and funny and made us feel at home. COME HERE WITH YOUR FRIENDS FROM OUT OF TOWN.
Milos was thereeeee best server! He was great and very attentive. The ambiance is beautiful especially when the sun goes down! Great food and even better drinks!

Nice breakaway from the city lights and cab horns. I have been her a handful of times and I see he quality of service fluctuates. Sometimes the folks behind the bar are great at recommending wine and can describe in detail while other times I get "oh not too sure". They have added live music which is nice and more food selection (do not get the flatbread it has no flavor). The rooftop is a nice happy hour spot for a chill ambience.

The location and view was great. The service was not great. I made a reservation on open table and when we showed up, the hostess was nowhere to be found. It took about 5 minutes for someone to come up and ask if we needed help and when he went to get the hostess, she threw a fit because we interrupted her dinner. The food was just okay, I probably wouldn't go back for anything other than the location.

I went with a group of four for my friend's birthday and we sat on the upstairs terrace. The hostess was very rude and dismissive, and when I spoke to the manager about it, she apologized and said she would send sparkling wine and cake to our table. She sent only the sparkling wine and then charged us for it. I won't be going again.

Best service, food, wine and food. I went yesterday with my mom. We live in FL and we went to NY for 2 days. I had this place on my radar for a couple of weeks and we finally made it. The place is beautiful, relax. We ordered a wine flight the sauvignon blanc, rose and  pinot were great (my favorite was Pinot). We had risotto balls, burrata appetizer and lobster roll. The risotto balls were so good that we ordered another round, but all food in general was amazing. Eating with that view was really a moment to enjoy. Also i have to say, I have not received a service as good as Milo provided to us yesterday. The guy is the best. I will definitely come back

Aw man. I hate writing bad reviews but my experience here was so bad I thought they were doing it on purpose to be silly. I ordered a glass of rosé the second I sat down and it only arrived after our waiter said "your rosé is coming" about 5 times over 20 minutes. Our lunches were wrong but we had waited so long for the food we didn't even bother sending it back. I asked for salt and pepper almost just to prove that it would never arrive (it didn't). The food wasn't very good and it was expensive for what it was and the WORST part is that all of the staff acted like we should be so lucky to be sitting at this place. Like, snobby and unaccommodating and saying "it's a two hour wait" to people who continued to point out empty tables...... whut?
Stephana is absolutely amazing! So attentive, absolutely wonderful, and gorgeous to boot. The drink came out cold, food hot, all you could want on a beautiful spring day.
Beautiful location. Stefana is amazing! Great service delicious food and amazing view!

Came here with two coworkers for lunch when it was 60+ degrees on a beautiful early spring day. We wanted to eat somewhere with outdoor seating, and the patio was a nice setting for lunch. I was in the mood for something light so I got the Little Gem Caesar salad with chicken. The portion was huge but the whole salad was COMPLETELY drenched in Caesar dressing, way too overpowering and acidic. I was only able to eat about half of it. Also, the restaurant must have not thoroughly cleaned the rooftop right above the patio because half-way through my meal, a lipstick-stained napkin floated through the wood panels above the patio and straight into my salad. I probably won't give the food another go, but will maybe come back during the evening for drinks when the rooftop is open.
Lucas was the best! Great drinks and great service! If you are looking for great views, music and outdoor vibes, this is the perfect spot.
Antonio was an amazing waiter. We had the best seat in the restaurant, watched the sunset, got awesome drinks and apps, and spent a Wednesday like a Saturday.
Great food, great wine, and great service. Thanks for a great meal, our server David was excellent!

Sooo accommodating! Brought a large dog here for dinner on a Saturday night and the staff was incredible, got us a table right away and was prompt with service and refills. Great food, drinks, and people!
No comment

Went after a Pride event and bought a beer outside. They have an outside bar area. Needed to go to the restroom and the hideous doorman refused to let me inside stating they were at capacity.  When I suggested I'd wait until someone walked out he said I had only purchased a beer outside and that I could not use the restroom. He also stated that if I didn't like that, I should sue them. "They can afford it". He, literally, yelled and called me names as I walked away to find a restroom. Fortunately, there was a group of NYC's finest near and they showed me where the restroom was. It's a cool place and the bartenders were nice but the experience with the hideous and rude doorman was enough to keep me from recommending or coming back. The pic is of him.
No comment

City vineyard is a great brunch spot, with amazing views. Brian was our server and he was attentive and even said happy birthday to our friend upon arrival! I would highly recommend going to city vineyard for all occasions!

I came to the City Winery with my friend and grandparents and we had a lovely brunch. Antonio took great care of us and the service was excellent. Really enjoyed the grilled cheese (omg, it's SO GOOD) and the bottle of Les Valentine rose. Food really exceeded expectations and the view can't be beat.
Great food and beautiful view, also amazing service from Flor, Very kind and friendly!! highly recommend!!

The oysters were so poorly shucked that there were huge pieces of shell in every bite. Then there was cardboard in the pizza. It was a disgusting disaster. We were starving and had to go to Shake Shack.
No comment

It was ok not what i was expecting. Food was anything but spectacular. The drinks were ok. The prices are a little high when you compare them to what you are actually eating. Anyways cute place but i def won't be going back.

This place has zero sense of customer service. Tables open everywhere; quoted 45 minutes. Waited for a drink for 26 minutes. Finally sat down, no silverware or napkins. No menus available. Save your money & dine somewhere else.
No comment
The food was a good portion and very tasty. The location is great and the staff is friendly! Flor was extremely nice and always checked up on us! Highly recommended brunch spot!

I went to brunch this Sunday with my mom and I had an ok time. The view is amazing the food is fantastic... however, service was just not good. I had no silverware, no napkins...(I know) luckily for us the barback I think his name is Anthony. Great guy, great service he made up for all the shitshow. Hopefully they can get their shit together!!! Fuck me sideways!!!!

The food and view was amazing . Such a cute place !!! We went on a Saturday night for my sister in laws bday ! Only complaint is that the service wasnt that great maybe because we had 17 people but thats the reason for my 4 stars . We had to ask 5 times and waited 30 mins for her cake to come out . We would definitely go back anyway tho !
Our waitress Flor was phenomenal, she was very attentive and made my birthday very special. We will be definitely coming back again.
Stefana was an amazing server...The views, ambiance, food and drink were all amazing! Such a good place to spend a nice sunny day.

I went with a group and we purchased a bottle of Rose at the rooftop bar. The restaurant fills their own bottles from a tap they have installed upstairs with wines in it. After pouring the remainder of the Rose into my glass, there was a piece of glass in the bottle. After being dismissed by two bartenders, a new bottle was filled for us. As we are finishing this bottle and pouring the remainder of the Rose, out comes a spore and slushy of mold. So not only was there glass in the first bottle, there was mold in the second. I wish I was making this up. Not sure how they're washing the bottles but be careful drinking from them, you might be sippin' on some mold.

Risotto balls were delicious and highly recommend as an appetizer. Happy hour lasts until 6:30 (wine on tap) which also includes a couple of their appetizers as well. Flat bread pizza is decent but not worth the buy compared to the mac & cheese / risotto balls. Views are the main attraction as they're located right on the water. Service was good, as the waiter let us switch seats, recommended entrees and wine pairings. Quiet ambience (indoors) overall, especially during the winter months. Outdoor patio was still closed as of November, since they were in the process of installing heat lamps.
Good food and good views! Sit outside and enjoy the nice weather. The hanger steak and eggs was delicious

City Vineyard is a wonderful spot on the water! My friend and I came for drinks and apps, which wound up lasting 3 hours due to the wonderful atmosphere and exceptional service. Our server Flor was so wonderful, attentive, and kind - definitely will be back for more lovely afternoons.
No comment

Great service. Amazing vibe. Came by on a Thursday evening. Place was packed w a nice, cute crowd, but super chill. The staff was awesome. Our server was PJ and he was quite helpful and made sure we were taken care of. Highly recommend the rooftop for a nice summer evening.

City Vineyard is a great outdoor spot on the Hudson! It's right on the water and has awesome views of downtown. There is plenty of space so it's perfect for a group and not having to wait. Justin, the beverage manager was very accommodating and welcoming! I came here a few times last summer and will definitely be frequenting it this year as well, as it's only gotten better!

Went for Valentine's Day and it was just an awful experience. The live music was the only enjoyable part. Service was very slow and you could hear the waiter apologizing to several people. The "complimentary" strawberries were non existent for us and they ran out of desserts. It seemed like they started throwing together whatever they could find.
The food was delicious. My waiter (Iram) was very knowledgeable on the food and wine and made many yummy sounding pairings that I have to try in the future. Look forward to coming back!

This is where you want to be for the spring as its coming on. Upstairs is perfect with open roof on the water and downstairs has full seating with full menu closed in to keep you nice and toasty!! Rose is delicious

I am abhorred by the service food and ambiance we received while dining for a birthday. First I will address the service. We waited 2.5 hours for our food which is totally unacceptable. While the waiter provided complimentary prosecco for the wait, we realized we needed moonshine when the food came because it was so horrible. The steak and eggs resembled beef jerkey and eggs at best, the calamari was rubbery like you would not believe, and if you happen to have a leaky radiator, the fried chicken sandwich will fix your problem for months by dropping it in. Horrendous, unacceptable, no words. Even the view of New Jersey was bad. I cannot wait to see this restaurant die a slow death at the merciless hands of the New York restaurant industry. Not worthy of a great city, barely worthy of Flint Michigan.
Great place. Good food, appropriately priced drinks, attentive staff, nice location, etc. Highly recommended.
I would start by saying our waiter rodrigo was very kind and funny and literally the best. I would recommend this place for food and drinks. Love the scenery.
No comment
Had such a fabulous afternoon at City Vineyard! Lucas and the staff were incredible, they offered tastings of multiple wine and food options. Will definitely be back!

Flor was great! We had an awesome time upstairs while waiting for the table and then came downstairs to have awesome service by flor to finish off the night with a sunset. Food was great, drinks were great!
It looks really good in this sleep it when you get down to it there's really nothing here that is significant. The view was nice especially upstairs.

I was looking for a rooftop restaurant and came across city vineyard.  First time here.  The environment was great, the hostess got us a table outside when there were none, which was nice.  Food and service was great.  PJ was very attentive to our table.  Thursday night, 9:30pm and the place was full. (speaks for itself)  Prices are reasonable.  We live in NJ, and found a new casual spot not far from home.   Enjoy.

I'm telling you.  New York prices of course but what's great place. Sat outside on the Hudson. Lunch time on a Friday.   Perfect salad, simply well done.  Michael had the steak sandwich.  I thought he wouldn't like the NY upgrades but he loved it. Great waiter...thanks Luke.  You done well for the folks from across the river.   Great place. We WILL be back to check out the dinner menu.

A beautiful establishment.  I am so happy we came here. Lucas is the best waiter. The view is great and the view is even better. I loved the flat bread and the wine on tap was fabulous. I can't wait to come back!!!!!!!! 10/10 recommend. Xx

Great spot for brunch! The views are amazing and the staff, especially Ashley, were super friendly. We had kids in our group and they were great about getting their food out early. The food and drink options were solid. There's a great park nearby too to let your kids run around.
Had the best time at City Vineyard. Great food with a view! Had the Cesar salad and it did not disappoint. Ask for Lucas, he will take great care of you! We will be back!

PJ was our server tonight, and he was super attentive, made great wine recommendations, and got us some bread before our main course arrived.  He also convinced us on the salmon tacos which were delish.  Great spot for seafood and excellent service.
Came here for brunch on a Saturday afternoon . Food was excellent... get the lobster Benedict! Wine on tap is excellent. Also, our waiter Antonio was the best! I will definitely be back!

Went here on a dinner date, it was perfect! The service was great, we came in slightly close to the kitchen closing (didn't realize) but didn't feel rushed at all. We got Moscow Mules and the Caesar salad (no anchovies). I got the Mushroom Risotto Bites- soooo good. We sat outside and had a really pretty view across the river. Again, great service and pretty atmosphere.
Yeah baby. Where do I even begin? Andy took care of us all day. Best server I've ever had. The eggs benny was magnificent!
Nice view and staff. Don't order food there lols Good place for a girls' night out but too expensive for pre drinks.

Such a great evening! We came with a group of 5 people and sat upstairs. Best view of the Hudson We stayed for the sunset. Service was impeccable. Laura was a wonderful server! 10/10 would come again. Peace and blessings, y'all.

This place is great. Probably the best drinks I've ever had and I've had a lot LOL!! Evan the GM is super friendly and our favorite server is Angelo. Give the hummus platter a try, you won't be disappointed. The wines are good and not smoky or too "homegrown". And the atmosphere is fun!  Don't forget the view. Who knew Jersey City could be so beautiful!
No comment
Had the best birthday brunch!  Their specials were exactly what i wanted. Enjoyed them with a beautiful view and bottomless mimosas.  Andy is the best!! 100% recommend

The atmosphere was very alive and inviting, with ample lighting and a good view of the water, however The food for the most part was mediocre, the Caesar Salad was less Caesar and mostly lettuce and anchovies. The steak was good, and the appetizers boring. However, something that really stood out was the service, especially from one server Rodrigo who especially seemed to dedicate himself to his job and was very quick on his feet and helpful. Overall, the food was mediocre and the service was very good.

This is my second time here. It's gorgeous! My friends just got married and we decided to come to CV for a few drinks. Our server Milos was friendly and fun. He took care of us. I will definitely ask for him next time. Milos made the experience great. Thank you!!!

Don't get why they have such poor ratings?! We went to a free jazz night (inside, February). Not a lot of guests, good service, food came quick, reasonably priced, loved the food. The design and the atmosphere of the restaurant is AMAZING, and then of course the views are GORGEOUS!! Truly recommend this place.

City Vineyard, the waterfront extension of City Winery, is such a great space.  I came here several times last summer and the service was subpar. However, today Brian served us on the patio and was fantastic. He was not only accommodating, but really funny, and super nice. Will definitely be back!

An incredible night at City Vineyard! The food incredible, the view divine and impeccable service provided by Lucas, Alexandria and Junior... a most helpful and attentive staff! I Highly recommend this spot for a casual summer evening at sunset!!! Gorgeous!!!
Great brunch place - nice patio area even in the winter. Flor was a great server and kept our glasses full during endless brunch! Would highly recommend
Bar is gorgeous, wine was ok. Definitely a hot spot, especially if you like being packed like sardines along the West Side Highway. Place is very nice though, recommend if not ridiculously crowded.
Love this place! Awesome spot on the water for drinks. Brian was so friendly and helpful! Will definitely be back :)

Such a great water-side drinking hole. The wine selection is fantastic and Brian, our server, was phenomenal. He knew the menu, knew the wine selection and was incredibly accommodating. Go to for anyone visiting NYC who wants to feel like a local.

What a missed opportunity. This place will probably do ok because of the high volume of tourists and workers in the area but the service issues persist and, after trying here three times, I won't be back. It's really too bad because this is the sort of place I would normally love and it's a 5 minute walk from our apartment but I will always choose Grand Banks over this place until they sort their service issues out. It's got an amazing location but that's about it.
I came here with no expectations and everything was absolutely perfect. The view, the service by Milos and his recommendations. Everything was amazing and will definitely be back.
Came here Friday afternoon and was seated immediately outside. Beautiful views on the water and Milos was super attentive!
Zero zero zero ..!the service sucks and the food sucks and the manager sucks even bigger( the manager on Sunday night that is)

Just no. Unless you are going for the view. Which is great. The food OTOH was quite bad and very expensive. The grilled cheese sandwich was not half as good as my home made one. And small. And PRICEY. This was lunch. The drinks were okay

Just loved it. Great food, amazing service and spectacular views. We started our meal with roasted beet salad followed by fusilli pasta special and mushroom flat bread. Our server Milosh was friendly, knowledgeable and on point witch made our nite special. I'm definitely coming back real soon.
I'm giving this place 5 stars because our server PJ was amazing. He made this experience an experience!!

This place is great for wine & drinking outdoors & that's about it. Reserved a party for 8 people and we arrived early and checked in. We went to the upstairs bar and had drinks. When we went downstairs at our dinner time, they said "didn't you already eat upstairs?" They had already given our table away but they resolved the issue eventually. Then they sat us downstairs but the drinks we ordered upstairs were not available downstairs. Ok, fine. Took 40 minutes for appetizers to arrive. We ordered entrees and the chicken was bright pink. The waiter took the chicken back from us but he never brought us back out new chicken entree. Later on, we gave them the benefit of the doubt and went downstairs to the outdoor bar and had a glass or wine for $17.50!!!! Overall, meh.

Location has a lot of potential unfortunately the service is not close to being decent. A brunch for 2 became a long exhausting struggle to get food on our table. Food that eventually cane at separate times forcing us to eat one at the time spoiling our time here. Nyc deserves so much better than this

City vineyard is great! Melissa our server was a real pleasure to work with. She was attentive beyond words. We will definitely come back for the food, prosecco, and view. See you in the summer months!

AMAZING VENUE!!!! Lucas was a fantastic server and took care of us all night. Alexandria was great as well. First timers here, but we'll definitely be back again!! Food was great and the wine was wonderful!

I came here with four girlfriends on beautiful Sunday and Laura was our waitress. She was so awesome! We got oysters and hummus and it was delicious. We got a mix of east coast and west coast oysters and they were very meaty just like Laura explained. I loved them! The hummus was excellent as well. The ambiance is unbeatable and can't find a better place to watch the sun set. Great spot to come to if you're visiting the city!

Amazing time at City Vineyard. Seated immediately, and when it became too hot they were kind enough to move us to a table in the shade. Flor was very attentive and really took care of us. Would definitely  recommend!
Views are great but the food was not good at all. The fish in the fish tacos was soggy and tasteless. Disappointing for the price.
Nice restaurant.. view is amazing. Food was delicious with excellent service. I would definitely come back flor is the best server!!

Views and ambiance were lovely. Our drinks were really good. But the food was awful. Very very salty, and lacked taste and creativity... and the fries and burgers were definitely frozen and mass produced. Not made in house. Bummer.
No comment

Stopped in after a nice Sunday walk on the West Side Highway with bae. Bar was packed and tables were bustling. Landed a two top by window in the back room. The service was amazing - specifically bc of Laurel. Great suggestions and allowed us to taste their wine list. House wines were solid! Suggest tasting the Hermitage and Syrah. Otherwise go with the Malbec from their bottle list. Sip and enjoy.
No comment
No comment
Such a great view and fun atmosphere! Always have amazing service, but Rodrigo is the absolute best by far!!
Great place to have lunch or dinner in the big aple with a view on the river. Justin and Flore were great. Highly recommendable!!!!
Great atmosphere and food. Our waitress Flor was an amazing waitress and very accommodating. The food was very good and big portion sizes. Definitely will be coming back soon.

Four of us girls who I have known for over 10 years came here to meet up. We were served by Rodrigo. He was GREAT! We would definitely come back just to have him serve us again. He gave great recommendations. We really enjoyed the choice of wine and dinner! :)

Great view - Decent wine but management really needs to get their stuff together.  Been here twice now and given the beautiful weather on a late Sunday afternoon everyone around us was served hors D'oeuvres with their drinks but we've been told the kitchen is closed and they won't serve us appetizers. Also, given the weather, why isn't their roof deck open?  There won't be many good days left before winter kicks in.
No comment

Beautiful view from the tables outside and such delicious food. Flor was fantastic, watching out food for us when we went to take pictures of the water, personally making sure to get our food and drinks to us on time and overall was an amazing waitress! Very chill area definitely recommend coming here :)

After reading a lot of negative reviews I still went there for a business lunch - waiter was helpful but managed to bring the wrong order we both explicitly said lobster role with salad and no French fries - and he brought French fries - after we told him he was very accommodating - it took quite some time until Food was served and we told him we need it quick.. the view and atmosphere is really very nice - there were not too many people at lunch so we were able to discuss business. Overall opinion the location is beautiful with great views - if you go for wine and a cheese/meat platter you should be ok

Had the best time here with friends. Brian was the absolute best!! Gave us a taste of their newest rosè (which was great, we ordered the bottle.) He was so enthusiastic and fabulous the entire dinner! The tuna tartare was incredible as well!!

City Vineyard is a great spot for a drink with friends, coworkers, etc. The view is amazing along the water and the staff is very friendly. They were very accommodating and gave great recommendations. I'd recommend City Vineyard to anyone in town.

Service was fantastic, Flor was our server and she was so patient and nice and one of the best servers I've had. The atmosphere was great, and great cocktails, and food was very good. Great menu options. We came for brunch on a Sunday. I would definiton come back. The view is great too.

Four of us came here last night. We had a table outside. As mentioned in other reviews the view is amazing. I loved my cabernet sauvignon and the rum punch. The grilled cheese sandwich was delicious. However I asked for salad and the server brought fries. Also we had to chase the server down for everything: food, drinks, the check. Would like to go again hopefully with a different server.

Such a wonderful early dinner.  The food was delicious, the drinks were great and the view was spectacular.  What made this meal even better was the service with both  Milos, Lily, Josue making this evening just right.

Awesome place! The views are simply amazing, especially at sunset. The ground floor terrace and roof deck overlook the Hudson and the Jersey City skyline, as well as the Freedom Tower. It has a classy feel, and the plants give off the aesthetic of being out on a vineyard/in the countryside as the name implies. I tried the house Riesling, and it was pretty good. I would say the drinks are very standard for New York in terms of both price and quality. The cocktail my friend got was $15 and just ok, you definitely want to go for the wine here!!
Just came here to say how amazing our server, Michelle, was. She went above and beyond and made sure we made full use of the happy hour. Will definitely be coming back!
No comment
Amazing bar staff. Willing to chat with you. Willing to do whatever to make your experience amazing. Susanne Patrick Matthew and jelly are a m a z I n g.

God forbid you want to just sit in the "garden" as opposed to waiting 100 hours for the restaurant. You'll have to wait online at one bar for food and another bar for drinks. After you order don't think about sitting outside with your party because you are forced to stand at the bar and wait for your food. Another case of an entitled NYC establishment. Get it together, we are paying good money!

Perfect venue for an intimate concert on a cold winters night. Location is amazing right on the Hudson. Food is spectacular and Chely Wright was fantastic. Good food, good friends, good music. Perfect night.  I already have tickets for 3 more Voices on the Hudson Shows.  Can't wait.
No comment

Went with a party of 5 to this restaurant. This places has an astonish view of the City from the rooftop. The food was excellent. The watermelon salad with goat cheese is a blast. Great place to impress on a first date. Our sever, Milo was very attentive to all our request.

Absolutely terrible experience. Entire staff is rude and disrespectful to patrons. Bouncers are disrespectful and don't care about  patrons. Would never come again and would tell everyone to stay away
Fantastic space overlooking the water. Nice, small selection of food and good variety of wine. The cocktail list is small.
No comment

Awful. We came at the opening time posted on both their website and yelp and traveled over an hour to get there ... were told at opening that they weren't having any walkups only people with reservations bc they were too busy the night prior..NOT NYC WORTHY
No comment
Ehh lots of scene to rely on. Little substance for a 32 year old. Venue location wins the day and ends up being an amazing Saturday spot.
City Vineyard was delicious and Flor was a fantastic waitress! She made she we were taken care of, and checked on our food. 10/10 recommend and ask for Flor! Great views too!
Nice atmosphere. Great place for  date night or group outing. Our waiter Milos was great!
No comment

First off, I made a BONE HEAD move and ordered tickets for a show and then showed up the day before (same performer, John Doe) with a party of four! The hostess was so kind, reassuring, teasing and facilitating our evening none the less. She said "don't worry, people make mistakes" which was just what I needed to hear (and to silence my friends who were ready to mock me endlessly). In no time at all we were seated and the 'mistake' turned into nothing. Perfect. The drinks came, then the food and the show and the whole night was perfect. Great staff, good food. I'll be back...and the views are spectacular. Thanks!
Best place to enjoy the warm weather in the city. Joe is a fantastic and tentative waiter!
Love this place! Bumping on the rooftop at sunset hour (gorgeous view of the water) and cute date night vibes for dinner! Recommend fully!

city vineyard is the best. it's always a great atmosphere and brian our waiter was great. he was really helpful with the wine list and the menu and brought our food and wine out quickly. great place and great people.

Really too bad because the location and view are lovely. However,  service here is one of the worst I've ever had in my 10 years in NYC. I heard the same from a couple of other locals but wanted to check it out for myself.  Unfortunately, until they fix the crappy service I'll choose to get my $20 glass of wine somewhere else.
No comment

Flor is the best server I've ever had. We came for boozy brunch and she made sure our glasses were always full. She's attentive and very outgoing. The food was great and we had an awesome time. If you are considering City Vineyard, you better do it.
Great place for oyster happy hour in TriBeCa. Wine is great and views are exceptional. They have a new heated enclosed patio right on the Hudson River - so lovely.
Brian was absolutely phenomenal! I had such an amazing time here & I felt completely at home here. the mussels are a must & I can't wait to come back again!
No comment
Brian was an amazing waiter and was so attentive throughout the night! we had a great time and will definitely come back!

I celebrated my birthday here with a group of 14 people. Let me start by saying that I changed the amount of people that I was expecting for my party. And they were flexible and nice about it every time. They responded to my emails quickly and everything was smooth and easy. The food was delicious, the views impossible to beat, the rooftop was great, and our waiter (unfortunately I forgot his name) was very attentive and helpful. The overall atmosphere was great and I highly recommend this place for dates, gatherings, parties or just casual nights. If I could give this place more than 5 stars I would!
City Vineyard and the staff are amazing! Janelle and Celeste are by far the best  I wanna come back all summer! Amazing service!
I love his place. The best views for a dinner or drinks during the sunset -- will definitely be back. Laura is the best  you def have to come here
Great experience - Flor was so attentive to our whole table - can't wait to come back!!
No comment

My family and I were walking down West Street when we stumbled across this jem. Antonio our server made sure we were well taken care of. He made us feel welcome. Overall, the service was fabulous,the food was excellent and the view was spectacular. The risotto was a modern twist on a classic, the steak was to die for and the seafood pasta was amazing! I highly recommend.

Oh gosh, I love this place! My first time ever! This vineyard was breathtaking! I met a hostess named Sherry who was absolutely amazing! Sherry gave great pointers on food and was truly patient with my family and myself! I'm very complex and she was able to me all my needs!!! I love this place an Sherry too! I wish there were more hostess like her!!!

This is my first time and I was recommended to this place by a friend. I am originally from Philadelphia and honestly this is probably the most amazing place. Not only is the view beautiful but the staff is amazing. Everyone was very welcoming with open arms. The body guards were friendly, and the staff but more IMPORTANTLY Antonio was amazing. He took care of us and went above and beyond to make sure we had an amazing time. I would highly recommend this place. I will be back to enjoy every moment of it.

We had Ashley and she was the best waitress!! She had great recommendations for food and drinks and was so friendly and awesome. The views are actually unbeatable the rooftop is a great spot to grab a drink and then come downstairs for dinner or lunch because food was great. Highly recommend rosé.

This is our first time here. The food was fabulous, the wine was top notch and the views across the Hudson were delightful! Our waiter PJ was courteous, helpful, efficient, and friendly! I highly recommend City Vineyard to you!!!
No comment

Lucas was an amazing waiter!! We got the paella for 2 + drinks = great time! We sat right on the water (pro tip have them turn the table sideways so that you can all see the water) Great Food Great Drinks Great Time
Flor (w/ one "O") was great. She had great service and recommended the perfect dishes for our table! She was very attentive and we loved having her as a server!
Flor was amazing. Best service we have ever received here. The views are amazing and the drinks are great. Will definitely be returning to this spot.
Always a great spot, especially for after work drinks if you work in the area. Ask for Lucas if you can.

I came here on Sunday with a large group (12 people) and the staff was very accommodating and our server, I believe his name was Lucas, was amazing! When the weather warms up, I'll definitely be going back :)

Great locations and lots of potential, except for the worst staff with the a horrendous attitude.  The owners of this place need to make some quick changes otherwise their money will be wash out in the Hudson.  Horrible experience , place was 75% empty and they would not seat you, claiming they were full.  It appears to me that the owners Are not from NYC, because anyone from here know that we New Yorks will not tolerate such hideous attitude.   Really a shame as this could be a great hang out place for the area.... hope they do not screw it up .
Needs more bathrooms. Took 30 minutes on a Saturday afternoon. Shit show. Not sure why they didn't build more in when capacity is so large.

Probably my favorite spot in lower Manhattan! The food is amazing, drinks are great and overall service is incredible. They have an upstairs patio thats great for drinks with friends also! Shoutout to our waitress Flor for her incredible hard work/service and making sure we have a great time. 10/10 would recommend!
Flor is the most amazing waitress. This place is nice. Nice view. Flor is nice and helps me a lot. She have good mannerism and helped my friends too.

Brittni was amazing. She was a breath of fresh air and was so amazingly accommodating. I had just a great time on an impromptu visit. Amazing service, amazing food (oysters were great) and incredible wine! Hoping to come back soon!!! (Hoping to see Brittni again!)
Our server was amazing! Andy has given us an exponential experience, I came with a couple of my friends to catch up and he has given us an amazing experience. Thank you so much!

Reservations for inside and outside dining is first come. I asked for outside and was able to secure a table with a great view of the water from the manager. She was very accommodating. Jacob was our server and he was very attentive despite the restaurant getting to be very busy. They could probably use more wait staff but he did the best that he could. Brussels sprouts were amazing. Oysters were delicious. The scallops dinner was very tasty and cooked properly. The mussels and fries were okay but the wine sauce was good. I'll definitely go back.
Flor was great and gave us great recommendations ! Good food, amazing view, and very tasty apps

I had a great time with my friends at city vineyard. There was a great view, the food was great. Service was impeccable; Flor was a great server. She took my food allergies seriously and I was able to eat comfortably.
Ordered pinot noir on a chilly afternoon and it was served cold. Who serves red wine chilled. All their wines are chilled, be warned.

This is an awesome place with a great view of the Hudson river. Plates are on the small side but really tasty! We got the cheese plate, flatbreads, and the risotto balls were so yummy! Better to come in the  summer or spring so you can stay outdoors, otherwise a nice, saucy spot to hang with friends with some music. Cant wait to come back when it's warmer! Also our waitress, Fleur, was really sweet
Antonio was phenomenal. Could not have been more accommodating and intelligent regarding wines. 5 stars. Would come back just for him

City Vineyard has a great atmosphere and great wines. It's definitely a place to hang out in the sun and drink some wine! PJ is the best server. He was so attentive and on top of his game. He single handedly turned my bad mood around!

I just went there for my mother's birthday and it was a disappointment. The drinks we ordered was absolutely nasty, and the food was no better. Plus we waited over an hour for our food to arrived just to be served little portions of cold, nasty food. This is definitely the first and last time I'll be dining there.
Hours posted were they close at 10 which leads you to believe that's when they stop seating but kitchen closed at 9:30. Looked like a nice place though.

Came here with my friend on a Sat around 2 PM. We got distracted by the free kayaking next door, so we didn't end up actually drinking until 3 PM. There's an upstairs and a downstairs. Most of the downstairs is indoors, but there's a partial patio and then the entire upstairs is a rooftop. We decided to go upstairs. It was pretty crowded on a Saturday afternoon, but we were able to find a seat on the plush couches which was a plus. I'm not sure if they do table service here or if you're just supposed to grab a drink at the bar, but we ended up just going to the bar to grab a drink and then we sat. I thought that this was a little overpriced--I ordered the pinot on tap. Think it was $12 a glass, which was expensive given the fact that it didn't come in a wine glass--it came in one of those little clear plastic cups. But for the vibe and the river view, I think it's a good place to come on a summer day every once in a while. Good place to chill on the lower west side and has a nice view of the river. It doesn't feel like you're in NYC because you can see so much sky! :)
Good spot. Great views. The bartender Erin was awesome. Super attentive and gave great recommendations.
No comment

I brought my four friends that were visiting here as I saw the great reviews. The ambiance and venue is great for summer. We were supposed to be seated inside, but when we arrived the hostess checked outside a seated us at a great table on the river. My burger was cooked to perfection. The rosé on tap was refreshing. The waitress, Flor, was super kind and attentive. I will definitely be returning myself and will make this a go to spot when I have friends visiting.
Came here with coworkers after work. They were able to sit us down immediately and the service was amazing! Milo is the man!
Amazing atmosphere and views! Great drink choices and fantastic vibes. Would recommend the dry rose cider
City Vineyard is a gorgeous place, with live music too! The food is fantastic, creative and fresh. Come on Thursday nights for live jazz!!

We loved this place.  Food was great and service by Antonio (Tony) was awesome.  We were lucky to come early and get a nice table outside.  There were 5 of us and we continued our party when the upstairs opened.  Again lucky to have a table and enjoy the beautiful day and view.  It quickly got very crowded so I would suggest getting there early!

Great brunch spot! We had to change our reservation time a couple times the day of, and the hostesses were nice to accommodate those changes without trouble. Our server Lucas was amazing!!! He checked up on us very frequently and was super nice, he always had a smile on his face :) We ordered the eggs Benedict and French toast and they were perfect. We ate downstairs but went to the rooftop after our meal to take some pictures of the view. The restaurant itself is super clean and has a nice ambiance. A cool spot that overlooks jersey city and the lower Manhattan area!
Great place for enjoying any meal on a patio overlooking the water. We had an awesome waitress named Flor. We had a great time and will be back soon
Great environment for a summer Saturday! Great drinks and he waiter milos was wonderful

Not sure how the food is because it has been over an hour since we ordered and have not even received our oysters. And it's not just our table there has been no food crossing the kitchen door over the past half hour although I do get glimpses of people cooking back there. Not sure where the food is going.

Rude staff, bad service and worse food. Had to wait 30 mins for just orange juice and the waitress was absolutely horrible with her behavior. I ordered a spinach omelette which made me sick. Left without finishing anything. Disappointed!

I thoroughly enjoyed myself at City Vineyards! My waiter, Iram was exceptional with his genuine and elegant customer service.  To top it off, his recommendations on wine pairings for the food I ordered were excellent. Thank you for a wonderful experience! I'll be back soon!

Watch your credit card receipts as they will charge you more than you signed for on the tip line!!!!  The server decided to double the tip amount and I had to make several phone calls all of which should have been handled after the first phone call to get this taken care of and reimbursed.  General manager less than helpful and made excuses about the situation.

The view outside of the pier is currently having construction done & right beside it is free kayaking with many people in bright yellow kayaks. I did not try the food, because they said they were out until 4:30pm. They were very busy and service was pretty good, but still had to get their attention multiple times to get something. Overall, I did come on a weekend, so I am sure during the week, this place would be a more enjoyable experience.
Best sunset bar in NYC. Great service and vibes. Food is solid but great cocktails and beer list in addition to the wine. Ask for Brian!
Great location and great atmosphere. Food is good too. The Rosalina is a strong yummy drink if you like tequila. Lucas is great waiter.
Amazing dinner and drinks with great views! Flor was attentive throughout our meal. We'll be back!

Came here for my friend's 30th Birthday brunch and it was wonderful! The food is delicious, and the bottomless brunch is a great deal. It was freezing cold outside so I ordered a Hot Toddy and it was probably the best one I've ever had. Flor was a great waitress and very attentive. The decor is cozy and the views of the river are lovely. Come here with a big group!

Stellar location. Cool vibe. Solid food and drinks. It should be a 4-5 star place. However, the service leaves a lot to be desired. We took a group of clients here for dinner on a gorgeous evening. It took over 45 minutes to receive appetizers because the kitchen was backed up. I do not think that is a viable explanation, particularly when the order consisted of chips and hummus and a cheese plate. Those should be ready to go on a busy spring night. Additionally, every time a waiter came to our table it was because we had to ask for them. They never brought additional plates, asked if we wanted another drink, or asked if we were going to order entries. It is a shame. As someone who worked in a restaurant, the service is a 1 star.... and that is generous. Please show tables more respect.

Great ambiance. Amazing view. Flor is a great asset to City Vineyard. Flor was able to give great suggestions and was very knowledgeable of all the selections in the menu. I will definitely come back and hopefully have her take care of me.

New spot in the area and found it here on yelp. Being from Long Island it's a nice change to find a nice vineyard in the city. Had a bottle of Sauvignon Blanc wine, and a meat platter. Didn't eat the burger but it looked phenomenal. Will definitely be back
No comment

First time visiting this beautiful restaurant! Gorgeous location right on the water and the food and drinks were incredible! We shared a bottle of rose, Brussel sprouts, sopressata flatbread, charcuterie board, and mushroom risotto balls, which were all fantastic! Our waitress Ashley had a great personality and was very attentive- she made our excellent meal that much more special!
Omg. This place is amazing. Susan who works on the rooftop is amazing. Abby and Christina are the coolest too. Great service. I love this place!!!

We had a great time at city vineyards. Flor was our server and she was extremely accommodating and friendly. The drink menu was ok and food was fine, but location was great for a hot summer night and girls get together.
Excellent drinks, food was great, and a stunning view. Great place to enjoy the weather and hang with friends!

Terrible experience for my first and only time here. My husband and I came with another couple. Sat outside, place wasn't too crowded since it was a mild day. Service was awful. After we were seated, we had to wait a long time for a server to come - to the point where we weren't even sure we were seated in an area that had table service because it took that long for someone to come over to us. Nearly all of the staff was rude and just seemed like they couldn't be bothered. Not just the hostess or our server, even the staff inside behind the bar. Unfortunately we'll never go back.
No comment

Love this place!  Gorgeous views on the water, friendly staff and good vibes all around.  Came here for our anniversary and the staff was so sweet to us.  We'll be back - highly recommended for a date out.  Andy was great.
Worth it for the view and wine. Terrible customer service! The host and hostess were unhelpful and rude. If you are going to this space, get there early and just go straight upstairs.

Amazing views, great wine, and stellar customer service. Our food was taking a while to come out so they brought out another round of drinks free of charge. Their customer service alone is the reason we will be back!
Great experience!! Our server Lucas was phenomenal. The crowd here is great and the ambiance is even better! Highly recommend
Great views! Fast service! Best place to hang with your friends in downtown Manhattan in a nice day!
Had reservations for a big party in the dining room and it was awesome! Great views, wine and food. Our waiter PJ was excellent! The mussels poulette were very tasty. Will definitely be going back!
City Vineyard was great for dinner and drinks! It was nice to be outside! Lucas was great!
Had a great time, got tan while drinking! Thank you Lucas! Great waiter, great experience!
We dined with Lucas and it was the best, great food, great service, great atmosphere, fab soundtrack and a+ cocktails! 10/10 recommend!
Lucas was great! Food and drinks were wonderful. Such a pleasant afternoon. So great for the views, perfect summer place.
Wine bar with very poor wine selection. Poor service. Cannot fill glass properly. Bordelaise sauce means ketchup. Lettuce means kale.
Brian is great! Thanks for helping us celebrate our friends birthday! Outdoor seating and a great brunch menu!

Went to City Vineyard on 06/06/2019 with a bunch a great friends.  It was a beautiful night and we sat outside, 1st floor. Andy was our waiter and he was great!!!!  The food was delicious -- especially the mushroom flatbread. We were unable to go upstairs due to the fact that it was too crowded.  BTW, you can only have drinks on the top floor -- no food. Will definitely be returning!!
Flor is an exemplary waitress. She made our experience wonderful and helped us truly enjoy our experience. Ask for Flor at this restaurant. I love this place, extremely good food.
Awesome place to be outside with friends. Great environment and great service. Lucas was the best!!
Great place to be with friends! Staff is super helpful and kind. Ordered the fried chicken sandwich, it was crispy and delicious!
The rose on tap was delicious and the view was beautiful! Great service by our waitress Flor. Will definitely come back.
Had a great evening with my coworkers here. Our waitress was Flor was great and was really helpful with her drink recommendations! Can't wait to visit in better weather!

This place is amazing! Can't say enough great things. I've been here before and love it so much. My boyfriend offered to take me anywhere for my birthday and this was my choice. It's especially great in the summer because it is very open and right on the water. They have a rooftop/patio with great views. The last time we were went was a rainy night and still an amazing atmosphere. They are able to close the patio so you can enjoy the views and stay dry. Be sure to ask for Lucas the waiter!
Beautiful restaurant. Great brunch option for the ladies! Milos our waiter took great care of us. Will be back!
Wonderful waterside spot with an awesome breezy and laid back atmosphere. Happy hour ideal. Our waitress, Flor, was super helpful, patient, and welcoming!
The cocktails are delicious and the food is amazing. Incredible service. Flor is the best waitress!!
Thank you FLOR for the exceptional service and fun! Amazing views coupled with sumptuous food and even better service. Can't wait to come back.
Great view. Mediocre food. Mediocre service. Food is very salty. House wine is okay not great.
This was a lovely spot for a breezy summer evening. Milos was so attentive and made sure that our meal and drinks were great.  Also, the filet was cooked perfectly!  I'll definitely be back.

City Vineyard was a hidden gem for me! Though I frequent the Tribeca area and have run the path, I did not know this place ever existed. My sisters and I went here for brunch, were seated on the (covered) patio overlooking the water and enjoyed great food (stuffed french toast, steak & eggs, chicken sandwich, pizza) w/our bottomless brunch.  Our waiter (Milos) was very attentive and did not rush us to place our order and answered any questions we had (i.e. food substitutions, cooking time, etc.) - he also made sure our glasses were NEVER empty!! Aside from the food, what I REALLY enjoyed was the GM Evan Fazio and other staff went to all of the tables introduce themselves and check on all patrons to ensure that their service/meals/etc were enjoyable and up to par - CS is key and City Vineyard has hit the nail on the head!!  Can't wait to return for another great experience!!!
Brunch & drinks are great here! Amazing views of the city. Our waitress Flor was awesome! Definitely recommend.
Found this little gem while walking along the water. Great food, great wines, and love the atmosphere!  Lucas was our server and bought us a round of Proseco. Highly recommend!!

Milos and Andy were the most hilarious waiters I ever had. We bonded over the fact that we put some french fries in our burger and cracked jokes throughout the dinner the whole time. They were nice enough to offer a complimentary bottle with our dinner! This place is literally the best. 5 star quality food! View is amazing. Couldn't ask for anything better. Happy 23rd birthday to my boy friend

If you're looking for a place to celebrate an anniversary or simply wine down with a view this is the place. To top it off they have the most amazing service. Milos was our server and he was absolutely amazing. He was friendly and made the experience that much better. Highly recommend!

Had my birthday dinner at the City Vineyard and had an amazing experience. Flor was such a gem! She was so attentive and accommodating for my large party. The food is my favorite! Being a picky eater, I am always able to find something I like! This is definitely one of my favorite restaurants​ in the city! I can't wait for summer brunches here! Also, the view is amazing!!! 11/10, would def recommend!

Celebrated best friends birthday, had an AMAZING time!! Our waitress Flor is the most accommodating, kind, efficient, and patient waitress st this restaurant. Totally recommend for any occasion!! Food was DELICIOUS, view is MAGNIFICENT, and the music created such a great vibe. Def go!!
Brunch was fantastic. For the price it is an absolute steal. Also the service was amazing, Andy was great couldn't have asked for someone better.

This place is one of the best places to go and relax with friends overlooking the water. When you are here, ask for Andy to be your waiter. He is one of the best in the city. Takes the time to know you and makes an effort to make your experience great. Goes above and beyond. Thank you Andy for a great time here
Amazing service! Lucas was very informative and provided impeccable service. Try the risotto balls. Definite recommendation.
Tony is the best waiter in the world.I will visit again it was a good experience in City Vineyard

Food was highly disappointing and definite waste of money. We got the charcuterie board...dunno how any wine-centered establishment can mess that up! It was terrible. The meats we're stale and dried out, the cheeses we're hard and equally stale. Entrees were tasteless and hardly edible (don't even remember what we ordered). The place was packed with drunken 20 something year olds. The only good aspect was the reasonably priced wine list and decent wine selection. Would only go again for a glass of wine,  MAYBE.
Good place for drinks and sights, but not food. Mediocre at best. Which is disappointing given it's potential.
Best dining experience ever! The view with sunset made it extra special, for myself as a tourist and with local girlfriends. Brian is the bomb, trust any recommendation he has!!!!!
Great food great service from Flor! She filled the drinks up every opportunity needed. Highly recommend (:

If I could give no stars I would do that for the hostess staff alone. They are not only unattractive, but they are unprofessional and confused. Their service leaves a lot to be desired! I think the managers would be appalled at their behavior. I stopped here with my sister for a glass of wine and appetizers. We were told we couldn't sit out back if we didn't plan on ordering food from the bar. We said great we would like a little something to eat.
